page.title: 12HOUSING
page.content:
Â£87,500-- Edge of the favoured village of Trull.An attractive and spacious detached{family house}enjoying superb views and adjoining open fields.Hall,3 reception rooms,kitchen/breakfast room,playroom,utility,5 bedrooms,2 bathrooms.Full central heating.Garage and outbuildings.Delightful gardens of about half an acre.
SUBSTANTIALLY REDUCED FOR EARLY SALE Charming two-bedroomed{cottage}in favoured Staplehay.Â£34,950
TRULL--A very attractive detached {bungalow}set in a larger than average garden in a pleasant and quiet village location only three miles from Taunton.The property offers 2/3 bedrooms and 1/2 reception rooms,very well fitted kitchen,bathroom,and shower room.Full gas heating Â£59,750
